column1: TABLE A - Key Employment Indicators with Measures of Precision, Philippines:
New Entrants to the Labor Force
Total Population 15 Years Old and Over
Youth Not in the Labor Force (NILF)
Youth NEET as % of youth population
Proportion of Youth New Entrants to the Youth Labor Force
Notes: Details may not add up to totals due to rounding.
1 Includes number of underemployed persons who were with jobs but did not work during the reference period.
NEET - Not in employment, education or training
All estimates used the 2015 POPCEN-based Population Projection.
Source: Philippine Statistics Authority, Labor Force Survey
